bibl.title: Excavations at Nessana. Volume II. Literary Papyri.
bibl.seg: Casson Lionel and Ernest L. Hettich, Excavations at Nessana. Volume II. Literary Papyri.
Princeton, Princeton University Press, 1950, 4°, xiv-175 pp. et 8 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR N.S., 2 (1952) pp. 36-37. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 30 (1950) p. 249. - J.F. Gilliam, Classical Weekly 45 (1951-1952) p. 155. - J. Hammer, Latomus 10 (1951) pp. 229-231. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 20 (1951) pp. 517-519. - Paul Maas, BZ 45 (1952) p. 59. - Arthur D. Nock, Speculum 26 (1951) pp. 503-506. - Roger A. Pack, JAOS 71 (1951) pp. 155-156. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 26 (1951) No. 52, pp. 411-414. - C.H. Roberts, JRS 41 (1951) pp. 201-202.
